PUBLB2.original: The Death Throes of a Republic
Officials also said they are paying special attention to eastern Europeans. Great, more racial profiling.
PUBLB2.translated: 政府还说他们会加倍留意东欧人。好，又是种族歧视。

PUBLB2.original: Well, it's finally over. The King has won and Rome is burning. The conservatives have had their way and the constitution is in shambles. With the renewal of the Jingoism Act, EVERY SINGLE THING YOU DO will be monitored. There are 300 million people in America and a reported 300 million people will need to be hired to track the every movement of every American. These are scary times and I am so glad to be a liberal journalist who doesn't interject her personal feelings into stories. The blogosphere is the only thing that can save us from this tyranny.
PUBLB2.translated: 好了，终于结束了。国王赢了，罗马正在燃烧。保守派成功了，宪法成了一团糟。在沙文主义法案更新后，「你所做的一切」都将受到监控。美国有3亿人，据报道需要雇佣3亿人来监视所有美国人的一举一动。坏时代要来了，幸好我是自由派记者，不必将自己的私情融入报导。博客圈是唯一能从这种暴政中拯救我们的东西。
